Docs.param: The message that describes the error.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
Line number where parsing error is hit in message body.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message, reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception, the response code, and response text.

remarks.para: If the error is not due to message body parsing the line number would be -1. If the inner exception is an XmlException the line number from the inner exception will be used.
